experience.title: Sub-head
experience.description: Conducted astro and tech events for the 9th edition of India's largest space-tech fest, NSSC, with 1000+ outstanding studentsOrganized 5+ webinars and lectures by eminent personalities at NSSC 2019, as well as sky gazing sessions for all members of the societyMentored workshops, conducted as Space Technology Awareness Camp, for promotion of the fest in local technical institutesWritten (and reviewed) articles on recent astrophysical events for the bi-annual newsletter "Moonwalk" and the SpAts website - spats.in

projects: [{"title":"Biomechanical Analysis of Porous Interbody Cages in Lumbar Spinal Fusion","start_date":"Aug 2022","description":"Incorporated TPMS porous structure (gyroid, diamond and FKS) in interbody cages widely used in spinal fusion surgerySubjected the model to physiological loading conditions namely flexion, extension, lateral bending and torsional movementPredicted results of the TPMS cages were compared with those of solid Ti interbody cages to evaluate the efficacy of the TPMS interbody cages."},{"title":"Design of Foldable Luggage Carrying Cart","start_date":"Oct 2021","end_date":"Mar 2022","description":"Designed a foldable luggage cart with a seating arrangement and stair-climbing ability to be used for comfort busy platformsModified stair climbing medium from 3-wheel mechanism to offset wheel mechanism to further reduce the weight"},{"title":"Thermal Modelling of Gas Tungsten Arc Welding","start_date":"Sep 2020","end_date":"Nov 2020","description":"Formulated heat transfer and fluid flow equations for a partially penetrated weld pool in stationary gas tungsten arc weldingSimulated the weld pool using COMSOL Multiphysics to find distribution of heat flux, current density and shear stress at surfaceConcluded that surface tension, Lorentz force, and buoyancy are the factors responsible for fluid flow"}]
